children.text: Tamaruya-honten Wasabi is a rare Shizuoka-Kanto Edition of Kit Kat from Japan.  Transforming the traditional burn of Wasabi heat to a slightly sweetened flavor, the Japanese Wasabi Kit Kat is not only rare, it's delicious!  With mild tones of horseradish, at first it may seem intimidating to less daring snack enthusiasts, but once you taste this unusual chocolate snack you will be hooked.
